title: 'Build Quality is not good
rating: wire starts to kind of like rotten in one year.'
body: '2.0 out of 5 stars'I charged with the recommended charger, but after 9 months, the encasing popped itself open, and the battery was swollen, when I gave it to customer care to fix, or at least close the encasing back, they returned in worse condition with no little fix, now using this with a tape wrapped around the encasing.  Also have frequent connection dropping problem, and sometimes it keep repeating in the loop that your device is ready to pair, and the reset buttons specified on the website don't work on my piece.

title: 'Review after 1 month usage'
body: 'After using 1 month I found the the mic malfunctioning had to visit boat store to get it replaced. Same happened with my airpod 441pro after using that for 3 months I found connectivity issue. And the replacement they deliver it will be a used old product and it will not work as the new one... Boat is heavily investing in Ads to influence but they are not give price quality products.'

title: 'The sound quality is commendable
rating: but there are issues with device pairing.'
body: '1.0 out of 5 stars'Brief of my review - I am experienced unauthorized headphone pairings, causing public embarrassments. Despite reporting, no resolution was provided. The device's utility is questionable due to these unauthorized connection. Potential buyers are advised to consider these issues before purchasing.  Here is the detail review. I have been using this headphone for over a year, and it's my second device of this kind. A significant issue I've encountered is its tendency to continuously pair with unidentified users without the owner's permission. At times, it disconnects from my device and connects to an unknown user. This has led to two major embarrassments for me.  Once, while on a plane, the cabin was silent. I was listening to music, believing my device was securely connected. Unexpectedly, an unauthorized user connected, causing my headphones to disconnect. Unaware of this, I attempted to play music, but it played out loud through my speaker, drawing the attention of the entire cabin.  A similar incident occurred during a meeting. Since then, I've been cautious about turning on my device in public places. I did report this issue to the relevant team a few months ago, but they still taking steps to resolve this problem but I didn‚Äôt get any kind of resolution.  If you can't use it in certain places, then its utility is questionable. Please consider this carefully before purchasing this device.
